des:
Use your voice to control your RIKA pellet stove.

This skill allows you to integrate your RIKA pellet stove, that is equipped with a RIKA firenet module and Software-Version >=2.26, into your Alexa smart home.

Setup
Follow these steps to integrate your RIKA stove into your Alexa smart home.
• Ensure that you have upgraded your RIKA stove to firmware version >= 2.26.
• You need an account on www.rika-firenet.com using the same e-mail address that you use to log-in to Amazon.
• On www.rika-firenet.com, add your stove to your profile. The name that you use here, will also show up in Alexa (we recommend “my stove”).
• Set the language in your RIKA firenet profile to English. 
• Install the free AMAZON ALEXA APP and log in with your accaount.
• Activate the RIKA VOICE skill under SKILLS AND GAMES.
• Start a discovery run to find your stoves (the stove will be recognized as thermostat).

Features
You can control the following functionality with your voice:
• Turn your stove on and off
 - "Alexa, turn on my stove"
 - "Alexa, turn off my stove "
• Set the heating power (changes to manual mode with set heating power)
 - "Alexa, set my stove to 30 percent"
• Set the target temperature (changes to comfort mode with set room temperature) - only available with optional roomsensor!
 - "Alexa, set my stove to 22 degrees"
